name: test_e2e_with_logs[229_CMD_ADV_066]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_ADV_066` |
| **Name** | IFS Bypass Cat Passwd |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `${IFS}cat${IFS}/etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%24%7BIFS%7Dcat%24%7BIFS%7D%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~15000ms
